name: Level 6 Design Masterclass Group 2 -Days Without Incident
name_original: Level 6 Design Masterclass Group 2 -Days Without Incident
description:
In 'Days without incident' players must move their character around the level in order to collect items. The first player to collect all their items wins. Try to get in the way of your opponent to stop them from collecting their items first.

-Key notes

Extract .rar to open project executable (WindowsNoEditor) and project folder. Reason for having both the executable and project is due to GitHub not allowing project folder to be uploaded.

THIS DOWNLOAD IS A PC ONLY BUILD!
